column4: What are some systems (either GNOME or KDE based) that would be suitable for a custom "kiosk" type thing for my grandfather?
depends on what you want the Koisk to do. KDE has a Kiosk mode.. of course Firefox has a kiosk plugin or 2 i recall.
i recall some live cd's that were designed for instant web browsing kiosks also
basically I want it to do email and some other stuff, but make it *very* simple
